bio: Fareloth is an Altmer man who is searching for his doppelganger, who led an ostensibly identical life to Fareloth's until the start of the Great War 30 years ago. Fareloth believes meeting this person will allow him to get a glimpse of the life he could have had. Berdier Wreans, who wrote the book "The Mirror", is Fareloth's favorite author. He has six brothers.
name: Fareloth
